points_of_interest.name: The Sacred Hill
points_of_interest.description: A low hill surrounded by dense thorn trees is situated close to the centre of this hex. Witches consider this a sacred site, calling it the Hill of Henlann. While the hill lies within the hunting grounds of the fairy Duke Mai-Fleur (p30), the duke and the witches pay one another scant attention.
points_of_interest.entering: Ascending the hill: Males feel their throats dry and contract; speech is hoarse and stammering.
points_of_interest.interior: At the crest of the hill stands a massive white marble urn, surrounded by a grisly collection of skulls.
points_of_interest.inhabitants: The skulls are actually those of thirty-five corpses, each buried up to its neck.
special_features: Males ascending feel throats dry and contract; speech becomes hoarse and stammering
Massive white marble urn at crest
Skulls are heavily weathered and bleached white
Most skulls missing jaws, some attached by leather ligaments or green copper wire
Skull crowns smeared with red clay cryptic symbols
Looking at symbols causes vision of being burned alive
Dead can observe events throughout Dolmenwood and answer questions
Dead speak in unison as rasping chorus of whispers
Service requires offering of at least 800gp value in marble urn
Offerings dissolve into green haze swept away by wind
Hasturiel itself may be contacted, 1-in-6 chance to respond to non-devotees

points_of_interest.name: The Rosy Gate
points_of_interest.description: A tangle of wild roses grows around a yawning cave mouth at the base of a gentle valley. Shimmering motes and rays of light play around the cave mouth.
points_of_interest.entering: Pushing through the briars to the entrance, PCs notice the summery scent of wildflowers and the cheery sound of birdsong emanating from the cave.
points_of_interest.interior: Stepping over the threshold whisks one away to the fairy road Buttercup Lane (see Fairy Roads, p26).
special_features: Wild roses tangle around cave mouth
Shimmering motes and rays of light around entrance
Summery scent of wildflowers from cave
Entering transports to Buttercup Lane fairy road
